He didn't dare to conceal them.
This is the cause and condition.
I and the ocean of sentient beings in the Dharma realm.
We don't understand the single realm of reality.
The results of all actions.
May they all be purified.
Next, I'll apply the seal of repentance to extinguish sins.

source_sentence: 唵薩[口*栗]末(二合)巴(引)巴眉悉普怛[口*捺]曷捺末日囉也莎曷(應誦三徧)　百劫積集罪　　一念悉盪除　　如火焚枯草　滅盡無有餘　我昔所造諸惡業　　皆由無始貪嗔癡　從身語意之所生　　一切我今皆懺悔懺悔已。
translation: "Om sah [mou*li] ma (bla) ba (citation needed) ba mei sishe puṭa [mou*n] rah (citation needed) rah doomsday rah (should be recited three times) All the sins accumulated over a hundred eons are removed in a single thought like fire burning dry grass, extinguished without remainder. All the bad actions I created in the past were caused by beginningless craving, anger, and delusion, which arise from my body, speech, and thought, and I now repent and confess them.

source_sentence: 至心歸命禮本尊毗盧遮那佛。
translation: I wholeheartedly venerate the original Vairocana Buddha.
○(White) All of you listened to this sutra's verse on impermanence.

source_sentence: 莫道年年相保守　　功德各自早修持　此會眾徒分散後　　豈知誰死復誰生　一朝入土成塵聚　　家中寂寂不聞聲　縱使靈牀安哭處　　何由可得見真形大方廣佛華嚴經海印道場十重行願常徧禮懺儀卷第四十
translation: "Don't keep each other company year after year, cultivating the virtues of each as early as possible. After all the disciples in this assembly have been scattered, how can we know who died and who was born? Once we enter the earth, we become a mass of dust, and our homes are silent and we don't hear a sound. Even if our spirit beds are quiet and weeping, how can we see our true form? Dafangguang fo huayan jing haiin daochang shizhong xingxiang changyi roll 40.
